author: juliomoros
content: Hello community, I'm looking for any exstent standarized solution for fee-sharing/dividend-distributor/rewards-distribution contract. My perception is that web3 industry in general is eager for this kind of solution but I haven't been able to find any current standard about it. Can you help me? Thanks!

author: abcoathup
content: This Discord is for Eth R&D, for application layer questions you can try: CryptoDevs discord: https://discord.gg/5W5tVb3
